by.tc.auction.dao.user_operation

Interface ProfileDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProfileDAOImpl

    public interface ProfileDAO
    An interface of operations on users profiles. An interface provides methods for operations on users profiles in an application source.
    Author:
    semenovich

    • Method Detail

      • getUserInfo

        User getUserInfo(java.lang.String login)
          throws DAOException
        Returns user profile info.
        Parameters:
        login - - a user login.
        Returns:
        A user if a user exists. null if a user doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getUserLots

        java.util.ArrayList<Lot> getUserLots(java.lang.String login)
                              throws DAOException
        Returns a list of user lots.
        Parameters:
        login - - a user login.
        Returns:
        A list of user lots. Empty list if such lots don't exist. null if a user doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getUserAuctionParticipation

        java.util.ArrayList<Auction> getUserAuctionParticipation(java.lang.String login)
                                                  throws DAOException
        Returns a list of user auction participations.
        Parameters:
        login - - a user login.
        Returns:
        A list of user auction participations. Empty list if such auctions don't exist. null if a user doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • editUserInfo

        boolean editUserInfo(User user)
              throws DAOException
        Edits user profile info.
        Parameters:
        user - - user updated info.
        Returns:
        true if user profile info has been edited. false if user profile info hasn't been edited.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • uploadUserImage

        boolean uploadUserImage(java.lang.String userLogin,
                        java.lang.String imagePath)
                 throws DAOException
        Uploads a user profile image.
        Parameters:
        userLogin - - a user login.
        imagePath - - an image path.
        Returns:
        true if a user profile image has been uploaded. false if a user profile image hasn't been uploaded.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.
